text:
Primitive Social - Lubbock, TX | REMOTE

Primitive Social is a rapidly growing digital marketing agency that focuses on software development, web design and development, sales enablement, inbound marketing, and social media marketing.

We are looking for a talented front-end developer specialising in UI / UX. Ideally you will have strong CSS and Vuejs skills and have a good eye for design.

Reach out to jerred[AT]primitivesocial[DOT]com with 'Hacker News' in the subject.
